desc.p: This field holds number of days. It will be used as part of the end of day processing to remove any matured messages and or those that have a status of WOF(Write off file), and copy them from CM.MESSAGE to the history file.
This field is used to call any user defined SUBROUTINE / API's. This field will accept only valid subroutine that is previously defined by the user.
Defines the name of the main record on the file.
The single record on this file must always be named 'SYSTEM'.
This is a multi valued field.
Contains details of any override applicable to this record.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered. This is a NOINPUT field.
